text: The VII Mediterranean Games – Algiers 1975 (), commonly known as the 1975 Mediterranean Games, were the 7th Mediterranean Games. The Games were held in Algiers, Algeria, from 23 August to 6 September 1975, where 2,444 athletes (2,095 men and 349 women) from 15 countries participated. There were a total of 160 medal events from 19 different sports. ==Participating nations== The following is a list of nations that participated in the 1975 Mediterranean Games: * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Sports== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== *Official website – CIJM *Mediterranean Games Athletic results – GBR Athletics website Mediterranean Games Category:International sports competitions hosted by Algeria Category:Sport in Algiers Mediterranean Games Category:Multi-sport events in Algeria Category:Mediterranean Games by year Category:20th century in Algiers Mediterranean Games Mediterranean Games
title: 1975 Mediterranean Games
